name: LeaderTHRIVEDaily
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Welcome to LeaderTHRIVE Daily, the daily show designed to create & growing high-impact leaders from the “inside-out”. Now, when many folks think of leadership, they think of a supervisor, manager, or director… someone with a title. I want you to throw that thinking out the window – a leader is, well, anyone. We lead in all areas of life, personal & professional. 

On this 1 minute daily show we’ll cover the topics that we, and I mean all of us, face daily as leaders. Some topics will be tougher than others, but my hope is that you will listen with intent each day and take action to become a Leader in your personal and professional life. We can discuss the best topics, situations and quotes out there – but they are useless without action. 

The purpose of LeaderTHRIVE Daily is simple – to serve as a resource for you in whatever season of leadership you are in and help you grow from the inside out.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
